message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.DB. 

The paper proposes a novel joint learning framework for building recommender systems that integrates the induction of explainable rules from knowledge graphs with the construction of a rule-guided neural recommendation model. This involves techniques from artificial intelligence (cs.AI) such as neural networks, as well as machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (cs.IR) for recommendation systems. The use of knowledge graphs also suggests a connection to databases (cs.DB) and potentially social networks (cs.SI) for modeling item associations.
